about.title: about
about.paragraph: My name is Yuri, i'm 24 years old and i am a Software Engineer. Currently my focus is on Web development. Here you will find some information about me, freelance and personal projects and how to contact me. As a Software Engineer, i create solutions using technologies! Some of the areas I work on: website development, institutional and promotional pages, SPA, among others.
